headline: Prediction: 1 Stock That Will Be Worth More Than Nvidia 5 Years From Now
summary: Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) has been one of the hottest stocks on the market in the past five years, delivering remarkable gains of 1,300% to investors during this period and significantly outpacing the tech-laden Nasdaq Composite's returns of about 100%.  Nvidia's market capitalization of $2.5 trillion makes it the third-largest company globally.  The good part is that Nvidia could deliver more gains in the future thanks to a sizable addressable market that could allow it to sustain healthy revenue and earnings growth for years to come.

headline: Meta seeks help to pay LLM training costs for Llama, The Information reports
summary: Over the past year, Meta Platforms (META) has approached Microsoft (MSFT) and Amazon (AMZN) to partner in paying the costs to train its large language model, Llama, The Information’s Kalley Huang and Erin Woo report, citing people briefed with discussions. In exchange, Meta has offered incentives such as direct influence on Llama’s feature development, the report states, adding however that some of the companies approached had balked at the idea that they would be paying for something that will
